pullrequest.title: Only link relevant libraries to tests

content.raw:
How do you feel about altering the `gz_build_tests` macro to accept the list of `extra_libs`? This would replace setting the `GZ_BUILD_TESTS_EXTRA_LIBS` variable. 

This change might be easier to maintain, and is a bit more explicit about what `gz_build_tests` requires.
